member.name: P:LabelPrinter.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:LabelPrinter.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:LabelPrinter.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:LabelPrinter.Printer.HexTool.AsciiToHex(System.String)
member.summary: Converts to HEX value of ascii character for each character in the string. This is needed because the ZPL contains characters that we can't save in the XML

member.name: M:LabelPrinter.Printer.HexTool.HexToAscii(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the hex values of the ZPL back to an ascii character for each hex pair in the string.

member.name: M:LabelPrinter.Printer.RawHelper.SendFileToPrinter(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a file to the printer in RAW format
member.param: The windows driver name/path for the printer
member.remarks: Only use ANSI data as this will print in RAW format

member.name: M:LabelPrinter.Printer.RawHelper.SendStringToPrinter(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Send a string to the selected printer in RAW format
member.param: The windows driver name/path for the printer
The ANSI text that is to be printed to the printer
member.remarks: Only use ANSI data as this will print in RAW format
